title: SpellForce 2 : Faith in Destiny DDE -PROPHET[EN/FR/DE/IT/SP]
description:
Title: Spellforce 2 - Faith in Destiny Digital Deluxe
Genre: Strategy, RPG
Developer: Mind Over Matter Studios
Publisher: Nordic Games
Release Date: 19 Jun 2012
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish

In times of war and chaos you will assume the role of a young man, who is supposed to liberate the entire world of Eo from the new, nameless evil. Along with a group of diverse heroes and a dragon as trustful companions, you will fight to gain information about this mysterious new enemy and thereby discover your own true destiny.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

* Faith in Destiny Soundtrack
* WorldMap in digital form
* Artworks Booklet in digital form

We have also included all released DLCs:

* Scenario 1: Flink's Secret Diary
* Scenario 2: The Golden Fool
* Scenario 3: The Last Stand

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
Game version is v2.28.2124 (latest from steam).
This release is multilanguage, but DLCs are only available in english and german languages.
